channel.title: 317 Teleports
channel.description: Hey can anyone help me make teleports for my 317 server... im a newb in coding ;/ i added a teleport but got errors in Compile so i deleted it... i want them placed here.. [IMG]http://i1097.photobucket.com/albums/g349/xRuneCraftxD/teleports0.jpg[/img] hope u guys can help me :( leave a comment or Send me a message thanks ;)

item.title: 317 Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Sorry, I haven’t used Delta in a while, but assuming that there are other teleports with text over the button, you should search for the method that handles that, and once you have done that you should find the answer to your problem.

Read full topic

This is NOT a spoonfeeding community. I advise you to read the rules. There has to be proof of work before help/instruction is given.

item.title: 317 Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Smudgerx360 Smudgerx360
item.description:
@Smudgerx360 wrote:

[quote=“Repu, post:4, topic:428775”]You will have to get the IDs and use the sendQuest(String text, int id) method

assuming your using a czar/delta based source so this will be different variable wise…but it would be something like this in a erm packet designated towards “clickingbuttons”

so something like

if (casebutton == id) c.getPA().startTeleport(x,y);

That is applicable if you wish to have the buttons teleport you.[/quote]

where abouts in client.java do i put this?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Teleports
item.dc:creator: @Repu Repu
item.description:
@Repu wrote:

You will have to get the IDs and use the sendQuest(String text, int id) method

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:428775”]assuming your using a czar/delta based source so this will be different variable wise…but it would be something like this in a erm packet designated towards “clickingbuttons”

so something like

if (casebutton == id) c.getPA().startTeleport(x,y);[/quote]
That is applicable if you wish to have the buttons teleport you.
